document.masterDocTitle: The stigmaeid mites (Acari: Stigmaeidae) of Kelkit Valley (Turkey)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The stigmaeid mites (Acari: Stigmaeidae) of Kelkit Valley (Turkey)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Eustigmaeus collarti
Doġan, 2004 a
: 97
, 2006a: 87, 2007 : 14 ;
Erman, Özkan, Ayyıldız & Doġan, 2007
: 7
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Materials examined. 3 ƤƤ from moss on stone,
40 ° 17 ' 22 '' N
,
39 ° 35 ' 35 '' E
, 1804 m , Köse Mountain,
29 VIII 2008
; ZMAU .

Remarks. This species can be distinguished from known species by the shape of the dorsal ornamentation, the absence of humeral callosities and the number of aggenital setae. General features of our specimens are similar to other specimens of the species.

Eustigmaeus erciyesiensis Do
ğ an, Ayyıldız & Fan

subSubSection.paragraph:
Materials examined. 4 ƤƤ, 4 deutonymph ƤƤ, 1 3 from moss near the brook,
40 ° 17 ' 27 '' N
,
39 ° 35 ' 31 '' E
, 1861 m , Köse Mountain,
23 VII 2007
; 1 Ƥ, 9 deutonymph ƤƤ from grassy soil under
Picea
sp.,
40 ° 17 ' 26 '' N
,
39 ° 35 ' 33 '' E
, 1833 m , Köse Mountain,
23 VII 2007
; 9 ƤƤ, 2 deutonymph ƤƤ from grassy and mossy soil,
40 ° 16 ' 32 '' N
,
38 ° 48 '04'' E
, 1632 m , Alucra,
24 VIII 2007
; 70 ƤƤ, 9 deutonymph ƤƤ, 7 33 from grassy soil under
Pinus
sp.
40 ° 17 ' 37 '' N
,
39 ° 35 ' 28 '' E
, 1583 m , Köse Mountain,
24 VIII 2007
; 4 ƤƤ, 1 deutonymph Ƥ from debris into the dried brook,
40 ° 16 ' 58 '' N
,
39 ° 35 ' 35 '' E
, 1814 m , Köse Mountain,
21 IX 2007
; ZMAU .

Remarks. This species, which is common in Turkey , can be distinguished from known species by its characteristic dorsal ornamentation, sword shaped dorsal body setae, humeral regions with major callosities, coxisternal shields completely separated along midline, ventral setae
4 a
absent, and aggenital shield bearing two pairs of setae. Our specimens determined as
E. erciyesiensis
exhibit all characters of other known specimens of the species.

: 850

subSubSection.paragraph:
Materials examined. 2 ƤƤ, 1 3 from moss on stone near a brook,
40 ° 17 '05'' N
,
38 ° 47 ' 55 '' E
, 1582 m , Alucra,
24 VIII 2007
; 1 Ƥ from litter under
Pinus
sp.,
40 ° 20 ' 49 '' N
,
38 ° 31 ' 15 '' E
, 1103 m , Şebinkarahisar,
27 X 2007
; 3 ƤƤ from grassy soil near a brook,
40 ° 17 ' 10 '' N
,
39 ° 38 ' 20 '' E
, 1839 m , Köse Mountain,
29 IX 2008
; ZMAU .

Remarks. This species resembles
E. erciyesiensis Doġan, Ayyıldız & Fan
; however, it can be distinguished from the latter by having ventral setae
4 a
and setae sci shorter than c 2 . Our specimens are similar to
E. erzincanensis
in all respects except the humeral callosities are bean-shaped.
